DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study demonstrate bioequivalence LCM tablet syrup single oral dose healthy Chinese male subject .
DOC.brief_title: A Study Investigate Bioequivalence Lacosamide Tablet ( 200mg ) Syrup ( 10mg/ml ) Healthy Chinese Male Subjects
DOC.criteria: Subject Chinese male 18 40 year age Subject clinically significant cardiovascular , renal , gastrointestinal , hepatic , metabolic , endocrine , neurological , psychiatric abnormality general good health Subject confirm study period 3 month final dose study drug , sexual intercourse woman childbearing potential , acceptable birth control method use Clinically significant range value hematology clinical chemistry variable abnormality physical examination vital sign ECG find Any clinical condition opinion investigator would make subject unsuitable study
